sentences.sContent: Can you explain to me the function of judicature?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can you explain to me the function of judicature?
sentences.sCn: 你能给我解释一下司法系统的功能吗？

sentences.sContent: And it is inadvisable to criminate the abettor separately by the aspect of legislation and judicature.
sentences.sContent_eng: And it is inadvisable to criminate the abettor separately by the aspect of legislation and judicature.
sentences.sCn: 在个罪意义的立法和司法操作中也不宜于对教唆犯单独定罪。

sentences.sContent: As to the permeation from moral to law, it is not only incarnated on legislation layer, but also obviously displayed on judicature layer.
sentences.sContent_eng: As to the permeation from moral to law, it is not only incarnated on legislation layer, but also obviously displayed on judicature layer.
sentences.sCn: 至于道德对法律领域的渗透 ，不仅体现在立法层面 ，在司法层面上亦是显而易见的。

synos.tran: [法]司法；法官；司法权；法官的职位

words.tran: 法官的职权；法官的地位

trans.tranOther: judges as a group, and the organization, power etc of the law
